trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the account data and operations common to all security principals.
trans-unit.target: 封装了帐户数据和操作普遍适用于所有安全主体。

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract base class from which all security principals are derived.
trans-unit.target: 这是派生自的所有安全主体的抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: Custom extension classes that derive from this class can call this constructor from the derived class constructor to initialize the base class.
trans-unit.target: 从此类派生的自定义扩展类可以从派生的类构造函数初始化基类调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Principal Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[主体扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00)概述主题。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived-class constructors to initialize the base class and is not intended to be called directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数由派生类构造函数来初始化类的基类，不应在代码中直接调用。

trans-unit.source: Custom extension classes that derive from this class can call this constructor from the derived class constructor to initialize the base class.
trans-unit.target: 从此类派生的自定义扩展类可以从派生的类构造函数初始化基类调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Principal Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[主体扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00)概述主题。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal.Dispose*> or <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal.Delete*> methods have been called on this class.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否<> *1> 或<> *1> 在此类中调用了方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by classes that derive from this principal class.
trans-unit.target: 从此主体类派生的类通过调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method checks whether the object has been disposed before it determines whether it has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检查对象是否被释放之前它将确定是否已被删除。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal.Dispose*> method has been called on this principal object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal.Dispose*>已经对此主体的对象调用方法。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal.Delete*> method has been called on this principal object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal.Delete*>已经对此主体的对象调用方法。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal.Delete*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a principal context that is associated with the principal.
trans-unit.target: 获取与主体相关联的主体上下文。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> object that contains the context associated with this principal.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref>对象，其中包含与此主体关联的上下文。

trans-unit.source: Gets a principal context that is associated with this principal.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此主体关联的主体上下文。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> object that contains the context associated with this principal.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref>对象，其中包含与此主体关联的上下文。

trans-unit.source: Gets the context type enumeraton value that specifies the type of principal context associated with this principal.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于指定类型的与此主体关联的主体上下文的上下文类型枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The context type is set on the principal context object in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 在中的主体的上下文对象上设置的上下文类型<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext>构造函数。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext>

trans-unit.source: The value stored in this class is associated with the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext.ContextType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此类中存储的值与<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext.ContextType%2A>属性。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext.ContextType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the context type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType"> </xref>枚举值，指定上下文类型。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the principal object from the store.
trans-unit.target: 从存储中删除主体对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that is not persisted in the store.
trans-unit.target: 不保存在存储中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object has already been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 已删除对象。

trans-unit.source: The target context type must match the context type of the current principal.
trans-unit.target: 目标上下文类型必须匹配当前的主体的上下文类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the description of the principal.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的主体的说明。

trans-unit.source: The description text for this principal or null if there is no description.
trans-unit.target: 此主体或 null 如果没有描述说明文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display name for this principal.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此主体的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: The display name for this principal or null if there is no display name.
trans-unit.target: 显示此主体名称，则没有显示名称的情况下为 null。

trans-unit.source: Disposes the current instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 释放的当前实例<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distinguished name (DN) for this principal.
trans-unit.target: 获取此主体的可分辨的名称 (DN)。

trans-unit.source: The DN for this principal or null if there is no DN.
trans-unit.target: 此主体或 null 如果没有任何 DN DN。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value that specifies whether the supplied object is equal to the current object.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指定提供的对象是否等于当前对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object that is compared to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"> </xref>与当前实例进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the supplied object and current principal objects represent the same underlying principal in the store; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果提供的对象和当前的主体对象表示的存储区; 中的相同基础主体否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an attribute of an extended class object.
trans-unit.target: 检索扩展的类对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of objects, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no attribute exists with that name.
trans-unit.target: 返回数组的对象，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果具有该名称不存在任何属性。

trans-unit.source: See [System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement Principle Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) for an example on using this function.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement 原则扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00)有关使用此函数的示例。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of an attribute in an extended class.
trans-unit.target: 在扩展类中设置的属性的值。

trans-unit.source: See [System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement Principle Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) for an example of this function.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement 原则扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00)有关此函数的示例。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the value of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 包含属性的值的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a principal object that matches the specified identity value.
trans-unit.target: 返回与指定的标识值匹配的主体对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref>指定的服务器或对其执行操作的域。

trans-unit.source: The identity of the principal.
trans-unit.target: 主体的标识。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be any format that is contained in the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.IdentityType"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以为包含在任何格式<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.IdentityType"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object that matches the specified identity value and type, or null if no matches are found.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"> </xref>对象与匹配的指定的标识值和类型，或如果没有找到匹配的为 null。

trans-unit.source: Multiple principal objects matching the current object were found.
trans-unit.target: 找到多个匹配的当前对象的主体对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a principal object that matches the specified identity type, and value.
trans-unit.target: 返回与匹配的指定的标识类型和值的主体对象。

trans-unit.source: This version of the FindByIdentity method determines the format of the identity value.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的 FindByIdentity 方法确定标识值的格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref>指定的服务器或对其执行操作的域。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.IdentityType"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the format of the `identityValue` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.IdentityType"> </xref>枚举值，指定的格式`identityValue`参数。

trans-unit.source: The identity of the principal.
trans-unit.target: 主体的标识。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be any format that is contained in the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.IdentityType"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以为包含在任何格式<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.IdentityType"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object that matches the specified identity value and type or null if no matches are found.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"> </xref>对象与匹配的指定的标识值和类型，或如果没有找到匹配的为 null。

trans-unit.source: Multiple principal objects matching the current object were found.
trans-unit.target: 找到多个匹配的当前对象的主体对象。

trans-unit.source: The identity type is not a valid <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.IdentityType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 标识类型不是有效<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.IdentityType"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a principal object that matches the specified identity type, and value.
trans-unit.target: 返回与匹配的指定的标识类型和值的主体对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the implementation of the derived-class **FindByIdentity** method to restrict the search to the derived class type and is not intended to be called directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由派生类的实现调用**FindByIdentity**方法以限制对派生的类类型的搜索，不应在代码中直接调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref>指定的服务器或对其执行操作的域。

trans-unit.source: The type of object for which results are returned.
trans-unit.target: 为其返回结果对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: This must of type <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> or a type derived from the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 这必须为类型<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref>或从派生的类型<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The identity of the principal.
trans-unit.target: 主体的标识。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object that matches the specified identity value and type, or null if no matches are found.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"> </xref>对象与匹配的指定的标识值和类型，或如果没有找到匹配的为 null。

trans-unit.source: Returns a principal object that matches the specified identity type, and value.
trans-unit.target: 返回与匹配的指定的标识类型和值的主体对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the implementation of the derived-class **FindByIdentity** method to restrict the search to the derived class type and is not intended to be called directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由派生类的实现调用**FindByIdentity**方法以限制对派生的类类型的搜索，不应在代码中直接调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref>指定的服务器或对其执行操作的域。

trans-unit.source: The type of object for which results are returned.
trans-unit.target: 为其返回结果对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: This must of type <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> or a type derived from the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 这必须为类型<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref>或从派生的类型<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.IdentityType"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the type of the identity value.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.IdentityType"> </xref>枚举值，指定的标识值的类型。

trans-unit.source: The identity of the principal.
trans-unit.target: 主体的标识。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object that matches the specified identity value and type or null if no matches are found.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"> </xref>对象与匹配的指定的标识值和类型，或如果没有找到匹配的为 null。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of group objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定当前的主体是其成员的组的组对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: This method returns only the groups of which the principal is directly a member; no recursive searches are performed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回仅主体是其直接成员; 的组执行没有递归搜索。

trans-unit.source: Recursive search results are available for user principal objects.
trans-unit.target: 递归搜索结果是可用于用户主体对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups%2A>方法。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: The groups that are returned by this method may include groups from a different scope and store than the principal.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的组可能包括从不同的范围和主体以外的存储组。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the principal is an AD DS object that has a DN of "CN=SpecialGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com, the returned set can contain groups that belong to the "CN=NormalGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果主体数据库具有的 DN 的 AD DS 对象"CN = SpecialGroups，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com，返回的集合可以包含属于的组"CN = NormalGroups，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com。

trans-unit.source: If the current principal is an AD DS principal, the returned groups include the principals primary group, as indicated by the "primaryGroupId" attribute on the AD DS object.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前的主体是 AD DS 主体，则返回的组包括主体主要组中，在 AD DS 对象上的"primaryGroupId"属性所述。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal"></xref> objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal"></xref>指定当前的主体是其成员的组的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of group objects that the principal is a member of and that exist in the store provided by the specified context parameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回主体是其成员的和，由指定的上下文参数提供的存储中存在的组对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: This method returns only the groups of which the principal is directly a member; no recursive searches are performed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回仅主体是其直接成员; 的组执行没有递归搜索。

trans-unit.source: Recursive search results are available for user principal objects.
trans-unit.target: 递归搜索结果是可用于用户主体对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups%2A>方法。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: The groups that are returned by this method may include groups from a different scope and store than the principal.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的组可能包括从不同的范围和主体以外的存储组。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the principal is an AD DS object that has a DN of "CN=SpecialGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com, the returned set can contain groups that belong to the "CN=NormalGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果主体数据库具有的 DN 的 AD DS 对象"CN = SpecialGroups，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com，返回的集合可以包含属于的组"CN = NormalGroups，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com。

trans-unit.source: If the current principal is an AD DS principal, the returned groups include the principals primary group as indicated by the primary group ID attribute on the AD DS object.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前的主体是 AD DS 主体，则返回的组将包括主体主要组，在 AD DS 对象上的主要组 ID 特性所述。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> object that specifies the context against which the query is performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref>对象，它指定对其执行查询的上下文。

trans-unit.source: When the context is located in another domain, the query is performed against the principal objects' representation in the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 当上下文位于另一个域中时，针对在指定上下文的主体对象的表示形式被执行查询。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal"></xref> objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal"></xref>指定当前的主体是其成员的组的对象。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the hash created from the contents of the principal object, suited for use in hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 检索创建的主体的对象，适合在哈希算法和数据结构哈希表之类的使用内容的哈希。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current principal.
trans-unit.target: 当前主体哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Returns the underlying <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object that provides the contact data for the principal object.
trans-unit.target: 返回基础<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>的主体对象提供联系人数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 基础<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The current principal has not been persisted and does not have an associated <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前主体未持久化且不具有一个关联<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the underlying object type.
trans-unit.target: 返回基础对象类型。

trans-unit.source: The underlying object type.
trans-unit.target: 基础的对象类型。

trans-unit.source: For AD DS, AD LDS, and SAM the type is <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 对于 AD DS、 AD LDS 和 SAM 类型是<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the GUID associated with this principal.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此主体关联的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: This property will always return null when the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal.ContextType%2A> property is set to Machine.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终将返回 null<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal.ContextType%2A>属性设置为计算机。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal.ContextType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Nullable <xref:System.Guid> associated with this principal or null if there is no GUID.
trans-unit.target: 一个可以为 Null<xref:System.Guid>没有未 GUID 的情况下为 null 或与此主体关联。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value that specifies whether the principal is a member of the specified group.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指定主体是否为指定组的成员。

trans-unit.source: If the current principal is an AD DS principal, the returned groups include the principal's primary group, as indicated by the primary group ID attribute on the AD DS object.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前的主体是 AD DS 主体，则返回的组将包括该主体的主要组，为所指示的值在 AD DS 对象上的主要组 ID 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal"></xref> object for which principal membership is determined.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal"> </xref>为其确定主体的成员身份的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the principal is a member of the specified group; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果主体数据库指定的组中; 的成员否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal"></xref> specified in the group parameter could not be found.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal"> </xref>指定组中找不到参数。

trans-unit.source: More than one matching <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal"></xref> was found.
trans-unit.target: 多个匹配<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal"></xref>找到。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value that specifies whether the principal is a member of the group specified by identity type and value.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，指定该主体是否是由标识类型和值指定的组的成员。

trans-unit.source: If the current principal is an AD DS principal, the returned groups include the principal's primary group, as indicated by the primary group ID attribute on the AD DS object.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前的主体是 AD DS 主体，则返回的组将包括该主体的主要组，为所指示的值在 AD DS 对象上的主要组 ID 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref>指定的服务器或对其执行操作的域。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.IdentityType"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the type of the identity value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.IdentityType"> </xref>枚举值，指定的标识值的类型。

trans-unit.source: The identity of the group.
trans-unit.target: 组的标识。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the principal is a member of the specified group; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果主体数据库指定的组中; 的成员否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The identity type or value does not correspond to a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 标识类型或值不为其对应于<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: More than one matching <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal"></xref> was found.
trans-unit.target: 多个匹配<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal"></xref>找到。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of this principal.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此主体的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the principal or null if the name attribute is not set.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置的名称属性的 null 的主体的名称。

trans-unit.source: The application tried to set the name to null.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序尝试将名称设置为 null。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SAM account name for this principal.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此主体的 SAM 帐户名。

trans-unit.source: The SAM account name for this principal or null if no name has been set.
trans-unit.target: 此主体或如果已设置没有名称的 null SAM 帐户名。

trans-unit.source: The application tried to set the SAM account name to null.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序尝试将 SAM 帐户名设置为 null。

trans-unit.source: The application tried to set the SAM account name on a persisted principal.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序尝试在持久化的主体上设置的 SAM 帐户名。

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes that were made on the principal object to the store.
trans-unit.target: 将所做的更改保存到存储在主体对象上。

trans-unit.source: If this is a new principal object, this method inserts it into the store.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是新的主体对象，此方法会将其插入到存储。

trans-unit.source: The principal has not yet been associated with a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 主体不尚未已与关联<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This type of principal cannot be inserted in the store.
trans-unit.target: 此类型的主体不能插入在存储中。

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred when saving changes tnso the store, or updating the group membership in the store.
trans-unit.target: 保存更改 tnso 应用商店，或更新存储区中的组成员身份时出现异常。

trans-unit.source: The principal already occurs in the store.
trans-unit.target: 在存储中已经存在该主体。

trans-unit.source: The password does not meet complexity requirements.
trans-unit.target: 该密码不符合复杂性要求。

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes that were made on the principal object to the store.
trans-unit.target: 将所做的更改保存到存储在主体对象上。

trans-unit.source: If this is a new principal object, this method inserts it into the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是新的主体对象，此方法会将它插入到指定的上下文。

trans-unit.source: If the principal has already been persisted, it is moved from the original context to the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 如果未保留主体，它将从原始上下文移动到指定的上下文。

trans-unit.source: If the specified principal context differs from the existing context, the principal is moved to the specified context, and the principal object no longer is located in the old location.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的主体上下文不同于现有的上下文，主体移动到指定的上下文中，并且主体对象不再位于在旧位置中。

trans-unit.source: If the specified context is identical to the existing context, this method saves the updates that were made on the principal object to the store.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的上下文等同于现有的上下文，此方法会将所做的更新保存到存储在主体对象上。

trans-unit.source: The context type of the specified context must be the same type as the current context type.
trans-unit.target: 指定的上下文的上下文类型必须与当前的上下文类型相同的类型。

trans-unit.source: This method may not be called by using the computer context type.
trans-unit.target: 不可能通过使用计算机上下文类型调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref>指定的服务器或对其执行操作的域。

trans-unit.source: The principal has not yet been associated with a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 主体不尚未已与关联<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This type of principal cannot be inserted in the store.
trans-unit.target: 此类型的主体不能插入在存储中。

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred when saving changes to the store, or updating the group membership in the store.
trans-unit.target: 将更改保存到应用商店，或更新存储区中的组成员身份时出现异常。

trans-unit.source: The principal already occurs in the store.
trans-unit.target: 在存储中已经存在该主体。

trans-unit.source: The password does not meet complexity requirements.
trans-unit.target: 该密码不符合复杂性要求。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Security ID (SID) of the principal.
trans-unit.target: 获取安全 ID (SID) 的主体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> for this principal or null if there is no SID.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>此主体或 null 如果没有任何 SID。

trans-unit.source: Gets the structural object class directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: 获取的结构化的对象类目录属性。

trans-unit.source: The structural object class directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: 结构化的对象类 directory 属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns a user friendly string representation of the current principal object.
trans-unit.target: 返回的用户友好的字符串表示形式的当前的主体对象。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the current <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式当前<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user principal name (UPN) associated with this principal.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此主体关联的用户主体名称 (UPN)。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to null removes the existing UPN, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: 将设置此属性为 null 移除现有的 UPN，如果存在。

trans-unit.source: The UPN associated with this principal or null if no if the UPN has not been set.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有如果尚未设置 UPN 与此主体或 null 关联的 UPN。

trans-unit.source: The underlying store does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: 基础存储区不支持此属性。
